premises: If a substance is acidic, it turns blue litmus paper red
If a substance is basic, it turns blue litmus paper red
A substance is either acidic or basic

If a substance is acidic or basic, it turns blue litmus paper red
If a substance does not turn blue litmus paper red, it is neither acidic nor basic
If a substance is both acidic and basic, it turns blue litmus paper red
If a substance turns blue litmus paper red, it is either acidic or basic

If a substance turns blue litmus paper red, it is both acidic and basic
If a substance either turns blue litmus paper red or is acidic, it is basic
If a substance is not acidic, it turns blue litmus paper red
If a substance does not turn blue litmus paper red, it is both acidic and basic
